ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country at Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.2_0: At that time an ivory-worker had invited the monks
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.3_0: who needed needle cases to ask for one.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.4_0: At that time the monks asked for many needle cases.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.5_0: Those who had small needle cases asked for large ones,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.6_0: and those who had large needle cases asked for small ones.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.7_0: The ivory-worker was so busy making needle cases for the monks that he was unable to make goods for sale. He could not make a living for himself, and his wives and children suffered.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.8_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.9_0: “How can the Sakyan ascetics not have any sense of moderation and ask for many needle cases?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.10_0: This ivory-worker is so busy making needle cases for them that he’s unable to make goods for sale. He can’t make a living for himself, and his wives and children are suffering.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.11_0: The monks heard the complaints of those people
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.12_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.13_0: “How can those monks not have a sense of moderation and ask for many needle cases?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.14_0: “Is it true, monks, that some monks do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.17_0: “... How can those foolish men not have any sense of moderation and ask for many needle cases?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.18_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.19_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.20.1_0: ‘If a monk has a needle case made from bone, ivory, or horn, it is to be destroyed, and he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.4_0: ...The monk who has been given the full ordination by a unanimous Sangha through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.12_0: if he makes one or has one made, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.13_0: When he obtains it, it is to be destroyed, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.2.1_0: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.2.2_0: If he has others finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.2.3_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.2.4_0: If he has others finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.2.5_0: If he makes one, or has one made, for someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.2.6_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.4_0: A hostile person would know what is going on,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.5_0: on the bank of the Vaggumudā,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.6_0: the ointment sticks on the body,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.7_0: the tangle has been tangled up;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.8_0: if it is a water wiper;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.10_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.3.11_0: The fourth rule, the training rule on needle cases, is finished.
